by submitting your review, you agree to: By submitting your review, you agree to our <0>Privacy Policy</0>.
privacy policy paragraph one: This Privacy Notice for Silicore LLC (doing business as Silicore) ("<0>we</0>," "<0>us</0>," or "<0>our</0>"), describes how and why we might access, collect, store, use, and/or share ("<0>process</0>") your personal information when you use our services ("<0>Services</0>"), including when you:
privacy policy bullet one: Visit our website at <0>https://silicore.io</0>, or any website of ours that links to this Privacy Notice
privacy policy bullet two: Engage with us in other related ways, including any sales, marketing, or events
privacy policy paragraph two: <0>Questions or concerns?</0> Reading this Privacy Notice will help you understand your privacy rights and choices. We are responsible for making decisions about how your personal information is processed. If you do not agree with our policies and practices, please do not use our Services. If you still have any questions or concerns, please contact us at brooks@silicore.io.
privacy policy paragraph three: <0>This summary provides key points from our Privacy Notice, but you can find out more details about any of these topics by clicking the link following each key point or by using our table of contents below to find the section you are looking for.</0>
privacy policy paragraph four: <0>What personal information do we process?</0> When you visit, use, or navigate our Services, we may process personal information depending on how you interact with us and the Services, the choices you make, and the products and features you use. Learn more about <1>personal information you disclose to us.</1>
privacy policy paragraph five: <0>Do we process any sensitive personal information?</0> Some of the information may be considered "special" or "sensitive" in certain jurisdictions, for example your racial or ethnic origins, sexual orientation, and religious beliefs. We do not process sensitive personal information.
privacy policy paragraph six: <2>Do we collect any information from third parties?</2> We may collect information from public databases, marketing partners, social media platforms, and other outside sources. Learn more about <1>information collected from other sources.</1>
privacy policy paragraph seven: <2>How do we process your information?</2> We process your information to provide, improve, and administer our Services, communicate with you, for security and fraud prevention, and to comply with law. We may also process your information for other purposes with your consent. We process your information only when we have a valid legal reason to do so. Learn more about <1>how we process your information.</1>
privacy policy paragraph eight: <2>In what situations and with which parties do we share personal information?</2> We may share information in specific situations and with specific third parties. Learn more about <1>when and with whom we share your personal information.</1>
privacy policy paragraph nine: <2>How do we keep your information safe?</2> We have adequate organizational and technical processes and procedures in place to protect your personal information. However, no electronic transmission over the internet or information storage technology can be guaranteed to be 100% secure, so we cannot promise or guarantee that hackers, cybercriminals, or other unauthorized third parties will not be able to defeat our security and improperly collect, access, steal, or modify your information. Learn more about <1>how we keep your information safe.</1>
privacy policy paragraph ten: <2>What are your rights?</2> Depending on where you are located geographically, the applicable privacy law may mean you have certain rights regarding your personal information. Learn more about <1>your privacy rights.</1>
privacy policy paragraph eleven: <2>How do you exercise your rights?</2> The easiest way to exercise your rights is by submitting a <1>data subject access request</1>, or by contacting us. We will consider and act upon any request in accordance with applicable data protection laws.
privacy policy paragraph twelve: Want to learn more about what we do with any information we collect? <1>Review the Privacy Notice in full.</1>
